name: The Glitchy
description:
This game has a lots of bugs HAHAHAHAHA created by ArnDev

Help: Your Goal is go to the Ring of fire you have to Jump and Shoot to Jump Through walls you can undestand it when you play it & follow the Description here look at the ScreenShots.

Controls:

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

Mouse1 - Shoot

Jump/Mouse1/Look at the wall - Wall Glitch
